item.title: Amanda add a quote by Austin Grossman
item.description: "There's a fine line between a superpower and a chronic medical condition." -- Austin Grossman

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "People, generally, suck." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Stephenie Meyer: Her vampires are sparkly, which I think we can all agree is wrong." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "She's so small, yet she contains so much evil." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Actually, orcas aren't quite as complex as scientists imagine. Most killer whales are just four tons of doofus dressed up like a police car." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "I can be most colorful and inventive when I am angry." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description:
"Joshua's ministry was three years of preaching, sometimes three times a day, and although there were some high and low points, I could never remember the sermons word for word, but here's the gist of almost every sermon I ever heard Joshua give.
You should be nice to people, even creeps. And if you: a) believed that Joshua was the Son of God (and) b) he had come to save you from sin (and) c) acknowledged the Holy Spirit within you (became as a little child, he would say) (and) d) didn't blaspheme the Holy Ghost (see c) then you would: e) live forever f) someplace nice g) probably heavan However, if you: h) sinned (and/or) i) were a hypocrite (and/or) j) valued things over people (and) k) didn't do a, b, c, and d, then you were: l) fucked" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "I've tried to get the angel to watch MTV so I can learn the vocabulary of your music, but even with the gift of tongues, I'm having trouble learning to speak hip-hop. Why is it that one can busta rhyme or busta move anywhere but you must busta cap in someone's ass? Is "ho" always feminine, and "muthafucka" always masculine, while "bitch" can be either? How many peeps in a posse, how much booty before baby got back, do you have to be all that to get all up in that, and do I need to be dope and phat to be da bomb or can I just be "stupid"? I'll not be singing over any dead mothers until I understand." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "She gave him the wide, green-eyed expression that she would have described as I will slap you so far into next week that it will take a team of surgeons just to get Wednesday out of your ass." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Animals might put up with that smiley shit, but people will eventually kill you for it." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Love is not something you think about, it is a state in which you dwell" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Life is loneliness, broken only by the gods taunting us with friendship and the odd bonk" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Charlie noted that more and more lately, he had a hard time resisting the urge to fuck with people, especially when they insisted upon behaving like idiots." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Pseudonymous Bosch
item.description: "Books can also provoke emotions. And emotions sometimes are even more troublesome than ideas. Emotions have led people to do all sorts of things they later regret-like, oh, throwing a book at someone else." -- Pseudonymous Bosch

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer
